list_definition.definition: to twist violently when trying to free oneself

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The child struggled in his arms.

list_definition.definition: to make great efforts or try hard

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: All his life he has been struggling with illness / against injustice.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He struggled out of the hole.

list_definition.definition: an act of struggling, or a fight

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The struggle for independence was long and hard.
